document_data.caption: A map showing Alathil in central Halruaa.
document_data.name: Alathil
document_data.mainbody: '''Alathil''' was a small town located in the nation of [[Halruaa]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B2aNEIc}}
document_data.Geography: Alathil was located in northern Haluraa south of the looming [[Nathaghal Mountains]]. The town sat along the north bank of the [[High Aluar]] river near its midpoint.
